Sentencas: The operation and performance of a SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) stack on biomass syn-gas from a biomass gasification CHP (combined heat and power) plant is investigated.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The objective of this work is to develop a model of a biomass-SOFC system capable of predicting performance under diverse operating conditions.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The tubular SOFC technology is selected.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The SOFC stack model, equilibrium type based on Gibbs free energy minimisation, is developed using Aspen Plus.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The model performs heat and mass balances and considers ohmic, activation and concentration losses for the voltage calculation.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The model is validated against data available in the literature for operation on natural gas.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: Operating parameters are varied; parameters such as fuel utilisation factor (U-f), current density (j) and STCR (steam to carbon ratio) have significant influence.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The results indicate that there must be a trade-off between voltage, efficiency and power with respect to j and the stack should be operated at low STCR and high U-f. Operation on biomass syn-gas is compared to natural gas operation and as expected performance degrades.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: The realistic design operating conditions with regard to performance are identified.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus

Sentencas: High efficiencies are predicted making these systems very attractive.
Titulo: Computer simulation of a biomass gasification-solid oxide fuel cell power system using Aspen Plus
